questions.question:
Three floating point numbers \(X, Y, Z \) are stored in three registers \(RX, RY, RZ \), respectively in IEEE 754 single precision format as given below in hexadecimal:

\( RX = 0\times C1100000, \quad RY = 0\times 40C00000, \quad RZ = 0 \times 41400000 \)

Which of the following option(s) is/are CORRECT?

(GATE CSE 2025 SET-2)

questions.question:

questions.question:

questions.question:
